meanings.definition: A person who brings a libel suit in court.
meanings.sent1: The libelant filed a lawsuit against the newspaper for publishing false information about them.
meanings.sent2: The libelant sought legal action after their reputation was damaged by the false accusations.
meanings.sent3: The libelant walked confidently into the courtroom, ready to defend their honor.
meanings.sent4: The libelant's lawyer presented a strong case, painting a clear picture of the harm caused by the defamation.
meanings.sent5: In the eyes of the libelant, seeking justice was the only way to restore their good name.
